File Object
Objects Reference
File Object

A File reflects a specific downloadable piece of media in your account.

type the type of file, with the following possible values:

Transcription: txt srt

Participants: raw_video aligned_video raw_audio compressed_audio cloud_recording

Screenshare and media board raw_video aligned_video

name the file name

size the file size in bytes

download_url the media URL to download the file.
